00014 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00015 // Function: TextEditProvider()
00016 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 TextEditProvider::TextEditProvider(QPlainTextEdit& textEdit) :textEdit_(textEdit)
00018 {
00019     connect(&textEdit_, SIGNAL(redoAvailable(bool)), this, SIGNAL(editStateChanged()));
00020     connect(&textEdit_, SIGNAL(undoAvailable(bool)), this, SIGNAL(editStateChanged()));
00021 }

00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Function: undo()
00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 void TextEditProvider::undo()
00034 {
00035     textEdit_.undo();
00036     textEdit_.setFocus();
00037 }
00038 
00039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 // Function: redo()
00041 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 void TextEditProvider::redo()
00043 {
00044     textEdit_.redo();
00045     textEdit_.setFocus();
00046 }
00047 
00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Function: canUndo()
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 bool TextEditProvider::canUndo() const
00052 {
00053     return textEdit_.document()->isUndoAvailable();
00054 }
00055 
00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Function: canRedo()
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 bool TextEditProvider::canRedo() const
00060 {
00061     return textEdit_.document()->isRedoAvailable();
00062 }
